oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multi-frequency and broadband hybrid-coupled circular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: radiating edges
gap
microstrip antennas
antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experimental investigations on hybrid coupled circular microstrip antennas (CMSA) are presented. Three circular patches with different radii with a small gap between them were fabricated The shorting strips of different widths were used to adjust the coupling between the central fed patch and two parasitic patches, yielding dual-band, triple-band and broadband operations.
